title: The Internet Is For Porn (w/ Ari Shaffir, Shane Gillis & Daniel Sloss)
description: Daniel Sloss schools Jay and Ari Shaffir on buying drugs in Scotland. After learning of the return of Roman and Sierra to YouTube, Jacob reveals he never watched internet porn before The Bonfire. Dan Soder tells the tragic yet hilarious story of his dad, Gary.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
